column2: Application launches via icon on desktop and displays options to sign up or sign in
column5: Tap on the icon on the desktop

column2: Sign Up gives options to enter enrollment information and then enter the app
column7: User is able to enter their personal information for enrollment and receives a confirmation once enrollment is complete and redirect to user's home page

column2: User signing in who has signed up will be allowed to sign in
column5:
Tap Sign In
Enter Username
Enter Password
column7: If user is already signed up and correct information is entered, system should log the user on and bring up the user's home page

column2: User signing in who has not signed up will be rejected
column5:
Tap Sign In
Enter Username
Enter Password
column7: User's login attempt will fail and an error will be displayed and the user will be prompted to enter a valid username and password
